content.detailedDescription: I was looking out off the apartment balcony to the north. i had a strange feeling to look up into the night sky. i assumed it was an aircraft flying west to east over the valley. the object was strobing white - green - red in a rotating manner and stationary no l or r movement, no vertical movement. estimating target about 3 miles away. it is about 2000 ft in the air west of the 101 in peoria. i was disappointed it would not come closer. it slowly disappeared heading west.
content.summary: Ufo spotted west valley phoenix az

content.detailedDescription:
This is the first time i have seen this type of thing and i don't know what to make of it. it boggles the mind.
i live in phoenix arizona and i was looking southeast at jupiter with binoculars around 9 p.M. when flashing lights came across my field of view.  i looked up and saw something moving with red,white and bluish strobing lights.  i looked through the binoculars and it was not an airplane. all you could see were the flashing lights and it moved a little erratically--in other words not a real straight path.  i followed it as it moved from south to north.  then, suddenly, it stopped, turned a pinkish orange and began moving south ! this was not a helicopter either.  i lost view of it because my patio cover was in the way.  as i began looking for it again i noticed more than one of these strobe like things moving through the sky. the lights would flash in groups of 6 or more and then stop and start again--unlike airplanes. when they started again they had moved.  i called ray out to watch with me.  he didn't believe me at first, but now he does !!  my neck was getting strained, so i pulled out a lounge chair and laid on it looking up with the binoculars.  now this really freaked me out--a white orb looking thing, (did not seem solid) much bigger than the stars i was looking at and closer, moved across my field of vision.  "oh my god, what's that?" i said.  i followed it through the binoculars as it moved from east to west and then it suddenly turned into these flashing lights right in front of my eyes !!!   i was utterly amazed !!!  what was i seeing?  ray and i watched the lights move around the sky--unsure if it was a few that kept moving to different spots or if there were many. we saw them in every direction at one time or another.  my grown son came home around 9:30 pm and watched with us.  he has been seeing alot of these same lights late at night when he comes home between 2-4 am and had told us earlier in the day he saw them in groups or clusters in the east and west the night before. i went inside to get my telescope but i just couldn't adjust it fast enough to take a closer look.    when we saw two of them follow an airplane that was heading west from the airport, we got a little worried.  there was never any sound coming from them. it was so hard to judge their distance.  around 10 p.M. all of the activity stopped.  i have looked the last two nights and have seen nothing like it.  i was just so glad that someone was home with me to watch. ray said he felt priveleged to see such a thing.  i thought it was exhilerating and scarey at the same time.  next time---we'll bring out the video camera.  if there is a next time !!!  did anyone else see this???  listen folks, we have visitors, and i felt like they wanted us to see them.  thanks for letting me share my experience.
content.summary: White orb  gliding through sky turns into strobing lights.  flashing lights seen moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
First let me say i did not witness this directly. only noticed photographic evidence upon returning home from vacationing in northern vermont.  

staying at a camp ground on the north end of harvey's lake in the town of west barnett. i woke up around 5:30 am. grabbed my smokes and camera and stepped out to the deck of the trailer we were using. there was a fog rising off the lake and most of roy mountain directly south was already 90% covered in fog. also a couple of men were in a small boat already on the lake. very picturesque so i took one photo, stepped a few paces forward and took two more photos.  it was the first photo dscn0402 that the object appears. the other two photos taken moments later [perhaps 15-25 secs] did not have this bell shaped object.

i then decided to capture some video with this camera because it was so quiet and still on the lake. because the camera is new and had only tried the video feature once before i did a test of the camera in video mode. this test only lasted 2 seconds but captured something moving at incredible speed across the sky and out of sight in only 12 frames or less than a half second.

i didn't consciously see or hear either of these events despite the fact i was gazing directly at this direction. i can't imagine how i missed something as obvious at the object in the still image right in front of me.
camera- nikon coolpix s610c
photo dscn0402a - full image reduced to 1024x768
photo dscn0402c - cropped image at camera's natural full resolution
video dscn0408 2 second video, avi


location: http://maps.Google.Com/maps?F=q&source=s_q&hl=en&q=barnet,+caledonia,+vermont+05821&sll=37.0625,-95.677068&sspn=32.114675,86.572266&ie=utf8&cd=1&geocode=frv4owidjqy0-w&split=0&ll=44.299834,-72.138762&spn=0.014159,0.042272&t=h&z=15&iwloc=a
content.summary: Bell shaped craft hovers over small lake

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home from a fishing trip at lake morena (which is along the mexican border about half way between san diego and arizona border) and was on a dirt road which winds behind the lake when my car bottomed out in a gully at the edge of a large meadow and got stuck. the time was about 10 p.M. and the date was some time early july of 1999. i got out of my vehicle, grabbed a small shovel out of my trunk and began the task of digging my back tires out of the rut. after about 20 minutes i stopped to take a break and smoke a cigarette. as i did this i noticed a bright light zig-zagging up and down along the side of a nearby mountain, shining a spotlight in a sweeping motion across the side of the mountain. at first i didnt give it a second thought, as i assummed it was a border patrol helicoptor searching for illegal immigrants. they are a common sight here, since we are so close to the border of mexico. after finishing my cigarette and a bottle of water i went back to work with the shovel and after about 15 minutes more i decided to get behind the wheel and try to drive out of the gully. as i opened the drivers door  my eye caught something in the air just to my right. it was a bright white orb that was maybe 4 or 5 feet in diameter. it made no sound whatsoever, and was hovering stationary, making no movements at all. it was only about 40 or 50 feet away from me and was about 25 feet from the ground. (and let me make one thing clear, it was not a helicoptor)i stared at it for maybe 10 seconds or so and then for reasons i still dont understand, i began to walk towards it. i do remember not feeling threatened in any way. and i believe i took about 10 steps toward it when suddenly a blue beam of light shot straight down below the orb and in a sweeping motion shot right into my eyes. (it had the characteristics of a laser and i could see particles swirling inside it, and iam guessing it was maybe 2 inches in diameter). i put my hands in front of my face to protect myself and for a second saw nothing but blue all around me. when i coud tell it wasnt directly in my eyes any more i lowered my hands in time to see the beam do something very strange, it did not cut off or wink out like a normal light would, it actually retreated back into the bottom of the orb as if it was on a string. i know it sounds crazy and light is not capable of doing this, but nontheless i witnessed it, and i dont think my description is doing it justice. as soon as the beam retreated back into the orb it began to slowly glide to my right which was southeast. i watched it until it began to round a bend with a lot of tree cover, but before it went out of sight it shot out a brilliant spotlight towards the south that momentarily lit everything up brighter then daylight and then it dissappeared behing the trees. iam fairly certain now that the light i saw zig-zagging up and down the side of the mountain was the same orb that i witnessed in the meadow.
as the years have passed and i have had lots of time to go over this event in my head, one thing that puzzles me about it was my complete lack of excitement immediately after it happened, i just felt tired and kind of "blah". in fact i dont recall even thinking twice about it until the next day. i told a couple friends and they just laughed and kind of rolled their eyes and thats when i decided i wasnt going to say anything about it after that.  i cant really explain it but as i thought about it more and more as time passed the whole event began to remind me of looking at a jigsaw puzzle with a piece missing. i know what happened to me but i feel like something is missing. its an odd feeling that i cant really explain the way i'd like to.
anyway, thank you again and god bless
content.summary: I witnessed a glowing white orb at close range which emitted a blue beam that struck me momentarily

content.detailedDescription: I was outside when i looked up and saw 3 flying objects(which had 2 large balls at the end of them that shined a very bright light) and i thought they were airplanes but they where traveling at the same speed next to eachother and then a 4th flying object came out of knowwhere and flew next to the rest of them, then they formed a square and stayed in the same posistion for few minutes then all flew off in different directions.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw flying objects make shape

content.detailedDescription: I  investigate ufo sightings for mufon in nj.  i decided to take my grandson dom to the practice session of the air force thunderbirds at atlantic city's boardwalk.   the main show is on wednesday on the beach . i took aprox 20 pictures with my digital camera and i caught an image in one of the photos.  after enlarging the picture to the max amount without distortion, the object is not a bird or a plane. it is a very clear image of some kind of unidentified flying object.  there is another strange object on a few of the other pictures but it may be a lens flair or something within the camera but i will check it out with a professional photo technician. of course i did not see the object when i was taking the pictures. after downloading the pictures to my lap top is when i made the discovery.
content.summary: Digital camera got image near the thunderbirds practice session

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were driving down street road in buckingham and we both saw a bright beam of red light shoot down to the earth. i first thought it was lightning but it was red and lit the clouds up red. another friend who was not with me at the time but also witnessed the beam and mentioned it to me saying how strange it was.  it was a perfectly straight beam
content.summary: Bright red beam flashes down to earth

content.detailedDescription:
This happened some time in mid april of 1998. dont remember the exact day. i was living in a small town called lake morena village just outside of campo, ca. its along the mexican border midway between san diego and the arizona border. it was around 4a.M. and i had just left my house on a short walk to lake morena to do some early morning fishing. while walking down the street i noticed what i first assumed was the moon between some nearby tree tops. it was very big, as the moon often apears here in the mountains. as i looked i noticed it had an odd shape to it. intrigued, i left the road and climbed a small hill with a rock-pile atop it to get a better look. what i saw was a well defined craft. it was v shaped and was luminous. the same color as the moon. it was the most immense thing i have ever seen. iam guessing its distance from me at 20 miles and its altitude at 10,000 feet, iam giving these estimations because it was flying in roughly the same flight path as that used by the commercial airlines that i have seen fly past for years. comparing it to the commercial airliners, iam guessing it was as thick as 5 airliners stacked atop eachother, and atleast 1000 feet long. aside from being luminous it had what appeared to be a luminous mist of some kind which surrounded it and tapered to a point maybe a half mile below it. (it was like a classic tornado shape)which didnt trail behind it but moved along with the craft.(very strange) it moved very slowly from the west to the east, towards arizona. it took about 20 minutes to cross the horizon and was quite a sight to behold.
thank you for your time and god bless
content.summary: I witnessed a very large luminous v-shaped craft cross the horizon

content.detailedDescription: It was roughly 9:10 we had just gotten home from picking up gift wrap and a local discount store and we were unloading it from the tuck when my husband noticed somthing in the sky he thought might have been a satalite,  after a few seconds of observation we realized it was moving to fast to be a satalite and much to slow to be a air plane or helicopter, a few seconds later we noted that it was changing from orange to red to white and it seemed to stop moving a few seconds later it seemed as if to wobble up and down and then it completly disiapered to this day i still dont know what the light was my only regret was not using my husbands cell phone to get photos )o:
content.summary: Color changing hovering floating light

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my date home last night around 2am or shortly after. we were less than 5 minutes from her house when i spotted a bright object in the sky about a half mile off, directly ahead of us.  i thought nothing of it at first, thinking it was simply a helicopter or a plane.  i immediately noticed how bright the object was, and that it had a pulsating red light.  at this point i could also see there were two or three seperate white lights.  i drove on, and as we got closer, i could tell the object was not moving.  i asked my friend what she thought about it, and she said she didn't know. at this point we were almost right next to it.  it was hovering above a barn about 100 ft in the air, and we could see a white light shining down on the barn.  we came to a crawl. i turned the music off. we didn't hear any noise, such as a helicopter whirl, but i regrettably did not open the windows.  we were kinda freaked out. a truck drove by in the oncoming lane and it appeared to slow down but i do not know if the driver noticed the object.

we drove a little further, and we kinda just looked at each other nervously. i didn't want to believe what i was seeing, but the whole setting just reminded me of something out of the twilight zone or some other 50's era sci-fi movie. she suggested we turn down the first street we saw, so i turned right onto a small country road.  at this point we lost visual sighting of the object and the barn due to houses and foliage.  when we came to a clearing, we saw the barn, but the object was no longer there.  this was no more than a minute after we slowed down to view the object up close. she said she thought she saw it far away, but i wasn't sure that was the same object. we turned around and decided not to go back to the barn. it was late and i wanted to get her and myself home. the whole sighting lasted about 3-5 minutes.  i have heard about the sightings in recent years in bucks county and figured i should submit this. as a matter of fact, i hope this report is helpful to any locals that may have seen the object.
content.summary: Unusual object spotted hovering over a barn silo on route 113

content.detailedDescription:
In 1955-56 in las vegas nev. during the day time,day and month unknown i was in my car with my two children. my one son remarked 'what is that in the sky?" as i was just driving out of my driveway i stopped and got out to watch. it was perhaps 150ft. suspended in the air. it was silver slightly metalic with port holes ( how many ? ) perhaps 4-6. after a few minutes it went straight up and to the right. i do not know what month but it was written up the next day quoting a neighbor seeing it and of course ridiculing him. i don't know if you are interested in this story after such a long time but i  have never forgotten it. i think i am a well grounded person and now 83 years old and still have my marbles (i think.) i wonder if there is some way to go thru the las vegas newspaper in those years but perhaps it would be too many pages to look at. if i remember correctly in was on the front page. i hope someone lets me know if i have been of any help at all. p.S. excuse the lack of comma's)

                                    ida nichols
content.summary: Metalic silver, cigar shaped, port holes suspended in air unknown date 1955-56.

content.detailedDescription: Three of us were sitting on the porch talking and enjoying the perseid showers when we noticed over the course of an hour three separate objects fly from the north to the south that seemed like a satellite at first but then would flash rythmically and become extremely bright.  i would estimate as bright as a candlelight at arm's length.  one by one they went over us.  i tried to dismiss them as satellites or high flying aircraft but i have never seen the intensity of illumination or rhythmic patterns they possessed. they also moved slowly and even seemed to stop at times while pulsating.  i was truly dumbfounded.
content.summary: Three flashing objects went from north to south

content.detailedDescription: i was driving on my way home traveling northbound on i-5 it was 8:15pm on the 12th day of august 2009 when i noticed a object hovering in the sky it had 3 huge bright white lights on the bottom in the middle of the craft.It was moving from northwest to southeast very slowly above the freeway about 100-120 feet off the ground i was checking it out while i was moving closer to it thought it to be a bit strange .It had no blinking lights and it was huge i believe it to be around 200ft long black in color it had a shape of a triangle  i was excited, went to pull over and when i stopped the car it was gone i was surprized no one else stoped to check it out also ..Thats my brief encounter
content.summary: Interstate-5 woodburn, oregon 3 huge bright lights moved slowly over freeway.

content.detailedDescription:
Disc shaped object flying no sound, i was taking pictures of the sky since i been seeing objects flying at high speeds.

most are silver or black discs, flying at extremley high rate of speed, sometimes cant see at all by the eye, a camera to catch it if your lucky at times..
content.summary: Disc shaped object flying no sound

content.detailedDescription: Something woke me up at 5am this morning before my alarm went off.  i mean right at 5am..Don't have any idea what it was that woke me up but i jumped out of bed. for a 57 year old woman, jumping out of bed at 5am is not part of my physical fitness routine..I felt i was still in a waking up mode but went directly to the front door in my pj's and stepped outside onto my porch.  the dogs followed me and went into the yard to do their morning thing.  i thought what the heck am i doing out here in the dark on my porch. i looked at my insulin pump to see what time it was and i thought to myself, wow, what the heck, i could have sleep another 45 minutes or so.  couldn't help but notice the sky was so beautiful, 1/4 moon in the lower eastern sky, you could see the earth's shadow over the moon making it a quarter moon also a bright star not far from the moon. i was in ahh of the sky that early in the morning and felt totally focused on it for some reason. just staring out into the lower sky..Sky looks totally different at that time of the early morning than when around midnight.  you see all clusters of stars and what looked like orion's belt. i seen my older dog sit in the middle of the yard again, as he done this once before with something strange, and he was looking west at something in the sky. just sitting there he was with no movement. that blew my mind.  i yelled at him to tell him to hurry up and do his business. all of a sudden, i felt somebody was speaking to me and was told to look up again..This look up stuff is getting old..The most beautiful whatever was cruising over approx. couple thousand ft. directly over my home. no noise at all, blinding blinding light.  no pulsating lights, just a constant radiating blinding ball of light..Totally white like a brilliant diamond shining.  couldn't even distinguish a shape as it was so bright.  whatever it was was certainly huge.  if i had to estimate a size to the object in the sky it would be 10 times the size of jupiter when she is visible.  i know that i recently had a sighting over the weekend and this is getting more and more strange to me. i feel pretty stupid sending in another report but i feel possibly something is breaking me in for some reason.  i am not frightened now at all thanks to mufon but this year has certainly been a sighting year for me and feel you may find me a nuisance.  i don't like to tell people about these sightings because most are closed minded and believe you are nuts after awhile. i am a very spiritual woman and have been for 17 years.  i don't share that info much either but i feel it has something to do with all this. my spiritual growth is very important to me at this stage in my life.  it seems the more spiritual i become, the more what i use to believe was strangeness and superficial is not strange and superficial at all.  this year has been the real big growth year for me and now all this extracurricular activity is happening to me.  i don't know if a camera with take what i see in the dark sky but i am going to start carrying one with me.  at 5am with a sudden wake up, i would have never thought to grab a camera.  can you tell me what the heck is happening to me?
content.summary: Looked like the hope diamond cruising in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were watering our garden in our desert home and as it was dark outside, except for the small garden lights, when i decided to take a photo of my husband he held his flashlight under his chin, to make sure so he said i had enough light.   he then took one of me.

later when i transferred these digital photos from my camera onto the computer there was this large round greyish blue object in the right hand corner in the sky.   i asked my husband what it could be and at first he thought the moon but then changed his mind as he looked closer.  we noticed from a prior photo that this same object only much smaller was high in the sky, and then on the one he took of me after i took his the object seemed to be hurtling through space and was getting smaller.

i might be wrong but there is no explanation for this object in my photos which i am including below.
sincerely
jean martino
content.summary: A large round greyish blue object which looks like it had heiroglyphics on it and a roun rim edge

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down charleston towards jones, on my way home from the grocery store. i tend to look at the sky frequently and noticed 4 blinking(they were blinking rather quickly, actually) lights over the mountain. i'd driven down this road in the evening before and had never seen the lights, but i didn't suspect anything weird, i assumed it was one of those light things they put on the top of mountains so that planes don't crash into them. 
then they began to move and i quickly threw that assumption out the window. 
they began separating and 3 of them headed to the left (my left), two of them disappeared and one remained much further than where it started (i can't remember whether or not the other one stayed in the original place, i think it may have). i kept my focus on that one for a good minute, and began thinking maybe they were helicopters. though i don't recall helicopters blinking that quickly, or being able to disappear that fast. i was a little more curious, but still wasn't thinking it was anything too crazy. my focus went back to the original area where i think there were a couple more objects hanging there... i watched then suddenly there were 3, 4, 5, 6, 7. i lost count after 7, because a few objects seem to be blinking in and out of vision. it was a huge cluster, nothing like i've seen. they began making formations, they made about 3-4, maybe 5... i saw a couple of planes/helicopters (it was so far away, it was really hard to tell what i was seeing) fly in that were definitely something i could place as ours. by the time i hit jones, they had mostly separated and dissappeared. though there were some sporadically placed about the sky. i was enthused that the light turn red and i could focus much more on the sky. there ended up being on in the sky sort of above my truck, though, very, very high. in the same height an airplane could be seen at, but it appeared much smaller and i saw no wings, it was still blinking, though much more slowly. it appeared to be white (white light, silver, i don't know.) and was just kind of cruising through the sky. 
i don't know if it was extraterrestrial or government, but it was totally cool either way and i was happy to see it! 

unfortunately, i didn't have my camera on me.
content.summary: Multiple unidentified flying objects over mountains.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my front garden, in hove,uk, when i saw 10 or so  yellow and orange glowing lights above the houses opposite, and were quite low. these lights hovered in the sky and stayed there for around twenty minutes then some disapeared hgiher and higher while some went over my house at spped. i thought these lights were planes at first however they were too close together and were the wrong colour. they looked very much like the lanterns you can get, which was my second thought however lanterns would not travel at a really fast speed. i was shocked and amazed when i saw these lights and ran into the house to show other witnesses.. the lights later came back, after i had a sleep around 2 hours and hovered there for another 20 minutes and instead of flying away they just got dimmer and dimmer and vanished. these orange and yellow glows look so similar to the ones on your home page, more or less identical, and was amazed that they were so close together,like i said i thought they were a group of planes but planes usually flash red or white lights ... which these did not. i first noticed them when i looked up and saw how low they were.
content.shape: Circle,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Other
content.summary: 10 yellow glowing lights above my house and others in brighton and hove.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard cleaning my grill when i looked up saw what i thought was an airplane, as many travel overhead to land at the morgantown airport. it was very clear evening, i felt more compelled to watch and the shape was cylindrical and bright, no wings nor flashing lights, very much like an elongated zeppelin with flat ends. the craft was moving at about the same speed as an airplane, which is why it didn't occur to me that it was a ufo. the craft was traveling well above 3000ft by my estimate, and was heading south west at approx 200degrees on a compass pointing north. while trying to make out the craft, a large brown sphere materialized behind and to the right of the craft, moved to be directly behind the craft, then did a little dance or 'juke' the headed toward the left side of the craft and 'de-materialized'. the main craft the continued on it's 200 degree direction until it went over the horizon. i could not tell if the main object was reflective or emitting it's own light. the second object emmited no light and appeared solid for a brief time. there was no sound at all from either craft.

while the craft was still traveling, i went into my home to get my spouse to witness but unavailable. so i waited until later in the night before i told my wife my what happened.
content.summary: 1 craft was cylindrical and reflective, 2nd was brownish orb

content.detailedDescription: I watched the craft as it moved south a little, stopping every so often and hovering for about 5 minutes, then it came to a dead stop. it hovered there for about 4 minutes and i started to get my co workers attention, before she could find it in the sky it darted straight for a cloud bank that was between where i was and the mt. st. helens volcano.
content.summary: Silver cigar shape over mountains near mt. st. helens

content.detailedDescription:
Laying on a blanket in the backyard at dusk (staying cool on a warm evening). very thin layer of clouds patchy over the sky, some stars show through. spotted a satellite tracking from northwest to southeast about five minutes before.

noticed a bright white flash low (20 degrees?) in the sky to the northeast. some trees in the way. i saw the flash again about 30 seconds later, approximately ten degrees further south from original flash. 

called to my wife, who came outback. we watched it flash about five more times. the intervals between flashes seemed to vary between 30 and 60 seconds, maybe as long as two seconds. the light source appeared to track toward the south east for the duration of the sighting. 

after i lost sight of it in the southern sky--blocked by house and trees--i went to the front yard and picked it up again. several airliners were visible on the southern horizon. their familiar lighting configurations and strobing patterns were nothing like the flashing object.

i caught two more flashes over a couple of minutes, and then could no longer spot the object. 

it was very bright, and appeared both brighter and larger (maybe twice as large) than jupiter, which is currently visible to the south. 

the light, when flashing, was very bright. almost like someone standing fifty feet away in the dark shining a bright flashlight directly at your face.
content.summary: Bright white flash, intermittent and irregular interval, crosses eastern sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was cooking outside for my family.  my nephew was on the top deck with me and he said to me what is that, a ufo?  my sister and i laughed at him then my son yelled from the guest house "look at the sky"  when we did we saw a bright orange object passing over us and headed east at a slowish rate of speed.  now there were 5 of us gathered and we watched a total of 4 of the object following each other at a distance immeasurable to us.  the object had no blinking lights at all.  it reminded me of looking at a chinese latern in the dark.  what really got me was the straight line it flew, as did those that followed it.  it was not erratic at all.  my feeling was we were seeing something never seen by us before.  and i had no guess at what they could be.  the objects eventually disappeared in the distance.

when i got home i wanted to see if there were any sights that reported these events and i found you.  i was shocked to find this report with pictures.  http://mufoncms.Com/cgi-bin/manage_sighting_reports.Pl?Mode=view_long_desc&id=18711&rnd=890281250563702  it is 100%, without a doubt the same as the sighting in france.  the picture is absolutely accurate.  my son has much smaller pictures.  again we are 5 and all saw the very same thing.
content.summary: Oval orange in color most closely resembled the color of flame

content.detailedDescription:
8/16/09 report of june 11 sighting from az may have been a weather balloon, attached pics taken on june 11. 2009 in az.

these pics, taken june 11, 2009 in az, were posted on another website on june 12.
content.summary: 8/16/09 report from az may have been a weather balloon, attached pics taken on june 11. 2009 in az

content.detailedDescription: My self and my neice's boyfriend were going to move a few hay rolls ,and while walking to the area where the forks were to put on the tractor i looked up to the sky and seen a flash, first i thought it was the sun reflecting off of a airliner which i have seen before, but this was not the case, i estimate the object to be about 2,000 feet up and about 1,000 feet north of me and the size of a large car ,sort of spinning and twisting , it reminded me of a  silver mylar baloon because of the way it was shinny and reflective. i stoped my neice's boyfriend , he was on the tractor, he said what the hell is that ? and how did you see it ?.He watched it for a few seconds and said ,it's probably a weather baloon and started the tractor up and continued. i stood there watching it for about 30 seconds and thought , i need to be videoing this, my truck was 100 yard away but i didn't even think about it and took off running to my house , it was about 500 yards away. i got in the house ,grabed the camera and tripod and got outside and noticed the camera didn't have the mount for the tripod on it! so instead of wasting time looking for it i left the tripod and ran another 100 yards to a pasture behind my house. it took me a few  minutes to locate it again. it seemed to have moved futher north but was still flashing and turning in all directions, then it started slowly desending and moving southeast. at times it seemed to change shapes .I have reported ufo's to mufon before and i'm not totally convinced this one is extraterrestrial but i have no idea what it could be.I have several minutes of video but i could'nt figure out how to upload it to you .I've got it on dvd and i'll keep it on my hard drive on the camera if you want to see it.
content.summary: Noticed a flash in the sky  , watched it move slowly  ,it was very shinny, reflecting sunlight ,videoed  several minutes of it.

content.detailedDescription: I have insomnia,so i often find myself outside on my back porch, smoking a cigarette, and staring up at the night sky.  my love for stargazing dates back to early childhood with my father.  around 6 a.M. this morning, i was outside, looking at the sky, hoping to see a falling star.  we have had some  really nice ones lately.  i was looking in a particular cluster of stars when i noticed a very dim "star" that was moving. it moved across the sky from left to right.  as it neared the right side of my viewing area i saw a second dim "star" moving equally fast coming from the opposite direction.  they passed each other coming quite close together.  at that time, they both abruptly changed directions.  the first "star" flew sraight up for a short distance, where it became a very bright flash of light (like a flash bulb on a camera), and then disappeared.  the second "star" looped around, flying a short distance, and then stopped.  it remained still for about two seconds, then took off in a diagonal direction, disappearing in a bright flash just like the first one.  unfortunately, i had no camera.  after the lights disappeared, i knew i had seen something unlike anything i have ever seen in my 40 years. it flew too fast and changed directions too quickly to be a known aircraft.  the lights seemed very high up in altitude and i was unable to ascertain a shape.  it looked like a dim white star and did not fluctuate in its intensity.  i also heard no sounds associated with it.  there were no other planes or anything in the air at that time.  i'm not sure what it all was, but i was certainly impressed by it.
content.summary: I saw two lights in the early morning darkness that moved independently of each other and unlike anything i've ever seen.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness claims to be a recently discharged navy seal with top security
clearances, and has had no prior sighting experiences. he was in his front
yard and looked up to see a large v formation of 5 lights materialize as he
watched, at an estimated altitude of 8-10,000 feet. he than described seeing
a series of orange lights converge on the triangle formation from various directions, followed by the object fading out. he estimates the total time
for the event at about 12 seconds from beginning to end.

later in the evening he again went outside hoping to see the object again, but instead, after a few minutes, he saw a red disc-shaped object flying from east to west in a high arc with a fighter jet tailing it before both
were out of his field of vision.

the skype line failed twice during our conversation, and i wasn't able to get his phone number (displayed as "undisclosed). hopefully he'll call back
with his contact info.
content.summary: Narrative below was based submitted by mufon dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were on the patio cleaning crabs for dinner, this has a western exposure, i went inside to get a pair of polarized sunglasses. after putting them on i looked west and noticed what i thought was a vapor trail above the clouds had not moved or dissapated. this was about 5 pm. if i removed the glasses this "object" was difficult to see. we continued to clean and continued to watch. i got our digital camera, aimed it thru the lens of the sunglasses and snapped a few pictures (theyare date and time stamped. the indicate where this "object" was in relation to the rooftops and other fixed reference points. maybe 15 - 20 minutes passed and still no dissapation. it remained as i first saw, a thin sliver of light, brighter in the center, but the left and right ends less brillant in appearance. however, it moved vertically but not diagonally or horizontally. i went to our neighbors and asked if they have seen this too. all did and were equally as perplexed. one of them confirmed that it was more visiable and defined by the use of polarized glasses. over the period of about an hour its brillance and angle remained constant, just moving up and down very slowly, contrary to the receding clouds. a vapor trail could not have remained intact for the dur ation of this event! i have seen other curios sights in past, this event now is number one on the list.
content.summary: Outside on patio, looking @ western clouds saw thin sliver of light above clouds

content.detailedDescription: This was late evening when friends and i were outside and started noticing lots of objects in the sky, one of them was thought to be a helicopter, and after turning off the camera, we saw one behind us, and what i recorded was not a helicopter, as for the photo, i was trying to take a pic instead and i thought i got nothing until i watched on my computer, i noticed that either it was a flying tether, or the object was moving so fast that i got it in 1 frame, there is no blur in or around the photo.
content.summary: This happened over my home over an hours duration

content.detailedDescription: Last night, i was walking down the beach, looking up at the sky when i saw ten objects which did not seem star like. i recorded the time of the event as approximately 21:15. i stayed and viewed the ten objects, some of which moved slowly and others which slowed down and speeded up. they moved from west to east. i stayed and watched for approximately 30 minutes before i left. i obtained a photograph of what i saw which is attached to this report.
content.summary: A couple of ufos in the skies above lowestoft.

content.detailedDescription: Same
content.summary: Bright red and green lights moving fast
